thread.title: Apriva to Sponsor and Exhibit at Annual Western States Acquires Association Conference
thread.title_full: Apriva to Sponsor and Exhibit at Annual Western States Acquires Association Conference - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Apriva to Sponsor and Exhibit at Annual Western States Acquires Association Conference
text:
Annual Gathering Brings Together Vendors, Acquirers and Financial Institutions to Discuss the Future of Payments
Scottsdale, Arizona
Apriva, the leading provider of secure end-to-end wireless transaction and information solutions, today announced that they will be exhibiting at and sponsoring the 2015 Western States Acquirers Association Conference , taking place from October 28-29, 2015 in Henderson, Nevada.
The 2015 Western States Acquirers Association (WSAA) Annual Conference provides an independent forum dedicated to keeping acquirers educated and informed on the ever-changing needs of the financial services industry. The conference will include informative educational sessions and seminars on key industry trends tailored for ISOs, MSPs, and other financial institutions.
WHO: Apriva participants will include: Stacey Finley Tappin, Senior Vice President of Sales and Marketing Communications, North America; Julia Decker, Executive Account Manager; and Taj Walker, Account Manager. The Apriva team can be found on the exhibitor floor during show hours in booth #67.
WHAT: 2015 Western States Acquirers Association Annual Conference. Attendees can register for the event at the WSAA website: https://www.westernstatesacquirers.com/wsaa-conference.php
WHEN: The 2015 Western States Acquirers Association Annual Conference will be held from October 28-29, 2015.
WHERE: 2015 Western States Acquirers Association Annual Conference will take place at the M Resort , Spa and Casino â€“ 12300 Las Vegas Boulevard South, Henderson, Nev., 89044. Apriva team members will be staffing the booth #67 in the exhibit hall.
About Apriva
Founded in 2003, Apriva is the leading provider of end-to-end wireless transactions and secure information messaging solutions that meet the exacting security and reliability requirements of financial services providers, government entities, and public service sectors. Through its two operating groups, Apriva Point of Sale (POS) and Apriva Information Security Systems (ISS), the company offers customers fully-managed, end-to-end, security solutions that incorporate hardware, software, network infrastructure and management tools. For more information, visit http://www.apriva.com .
